title: karuNai siridEnum
sahitya:
karuNai siridEnum puriya vENumayyE tiruccendUril sirandOngum ayyanE


anupallavi

  karum kaDal arugE arum kATSi tarum kandanE undan cintai kanindu nI


caraNam    varundi manam vADi varum anaivarukkum viraindun aruLai purindu varuvOnE
nirainda kuraiyAl nenjam ayarndu ninnaruLai nADum ennuLLam kuLira nI
